about_the_game:
A Golden cosmetic for your name in:

* Campaign matches. You see your name golden when its your turn. Opponent AI is not affected.
* Online matches. You see (and your opponent sees) your name golden when it's your turn.
* Local matches. You see ALL player names golden. For example "Player 1" golden, "Player 2" golden, etc.
detailed_description:
A Golden cosmetic for your name in:

* Campaign matches. You see your name golden when its your turn. Opponent AI is not affected.
* Online matches. You see (and your opponent sees) your name golden when it's your turn.
* Local matches. You see ALL player names golden. For example "Player 1" golden, "Player 2" golden, etc.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Equivalent Distro
  • Processor: 2Cores 2.0 Ghz 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Anything made in the last 5 years should do, really.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu Equivalent Distro
  • Processor: 2Cores 3.0 Ghz 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Anything made in the last 5 years should do, really.
